column4: I installed Ubuntu 8.10 and it will not see my usb hard drive at all .   What can I do ?
what does "lsusb" tell you on the commandline?
hmm, do you mind   dmesg | pastebinit
you can install pastebinit by "sudo aptitude install pastebinit"
Here is this what you asked for http://pastebin.com/m214aa8c6
cant find anything suspicious in the pastebin
